mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (FAQ_ID, ADMI_ID, ADMI_NAME, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENTS) VALUES (SEQ_FAQ.nextval, #{admi_id}, (SELECT ADMI_NAME FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMI_ID = #{admi_id}), #{faq_title}, #{faq_contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(FAQ_ID) AS totalpage FROM FAQ

SELECT B.FAQ_ID, B.ADMI_NAME, B.FAQ_TITLE FROM ( SELECT /*+index_desc(IDX_FAQ_PK)*/ ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.FAQ_ID, A.ADMI_NAME, A.FAQ_TITLE FROM( SELECT FAQ_ID, ADMI_NAME, FAQ_TITLE FROM FAQ ORDER BY FAQ_ID DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page}*#{amount}) B WHERE B.RNUM > (#{page}-1)*#{amount}
SELECT FAQ_ID, ADMI_ID, ADMI_NAME, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENTS FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_ID = #{faq_id}
